alert.note: Alert for Dane; Iowa; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 10:00PM CDT until April 04 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Iowa County in south central Wisconsin... Northwestern Dane County in south central Wisconsin... Southern Sauk County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1000 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dodgeville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dodgeville, Prairie Du Sac, Sauk City, Mazomanie, Spring Green, Black Earth, Barneveld, Arena, Plain, Ridgeway, Clyde, Governor Dodge St Park, Edmund, Blue Mound St Park, Jonesdale, and Marxville. This includes the following Locations Hyde`s Mill and The House on the Rock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
